Instance Method# canPrevent(_:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 14.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
override dynamic func canPrevent(_ preventedGestureRecognizer: UIGestureRecognizer) -> Bool
```
